Notes for Intro to Data Analysis!

2017-03-24

Lesson 1:

  • Data Analysis Process
    • Question
    • Wrangle
      • Acquiring Data
      • Cleaning Data
    • Explore
    • Draw conclusions
    • Communicate
  • The process is iterative and need to go back and forth.
  • Each row of csv can be represented in two ways in python
    • As a list
    • As a dictionary
